252992.「はぁ…はぁ……。\n おい みんな 大丈夫か……？: Hah... hah... hey, is everyone all right...?

252994.「大魔瘴期が近づいている このタイミングで\n 魔仙卿め わけのわからないことを:
The Age of Miasma is approaching, and the
Oracle suddenly does this out of nowhere...
what a pain in the ass.

252995.「魔界と アストルティアの\n 怨念の連鎖を 断ち切れとはな……。\n 簡単に:
Breaking the chains of hatred between the
Demon World and Astoltia is easier said than
done.

252996.「大魔瘴期が来れば 魔界全土が\n ただでは 済まないだろう。\n 今は 僕らも:
When the Age of Miasma comes, no place in the
Demon World will be spared. Now is not the
time for bickering.

252997.「その通りだ。今は 大魔王のもとで\n 俺たち魔族が ひとつになって\n 大魔瘴:
That's right. Now, under the Demon Lord,
we demons must unite as one to face the Age of
Miasma.

252998.「フン……。大魔瘴期が 終わったら\n 私は この くだらん馴れ合いから抜けるぞ:
Hmph... when the Age of Miasma is over, I'll
be out of this silly farcical friendship.

252999.「だが それまでは チカラを貸してやる。: But until then, I shall lend you my strength.

253001.「君のおかげで 魔界の三国が\n ついに まとまることが できた……。\n ここ:
Thanks to you, the three kingdoms of the Demon
World have finally come together... it's been
a long road to get here.

253002.「しょっぱなから えらい目にあったな。\n とても 祝うような空気じゃ\n なく:
It was a rough start. It's not really a
celebration anymore, but...

253003.「ひとまず 大魔王就任 おめでとう。\n これからも よろしく頼むぜ……\n 大:
First of all, congratulations on your
inauguration. Please keep up the good work...
Demon Lord.

253004.「我 魔仙卿は 新たな大魔王として\n この者を 選定せり。\n その権能をもっ:
I, the Oracle, have chosen this person as the
new Demon Lord. By my authority, I shall
now perform the coronation ceremony.

253005.「我ら 魔界に生きる者の心は 大魔王のもとに\n ひとつとなり 大命へと向かわん:
The hearts and minds of all who live in the Demon World will be united under the Demon Lord to achieve prosperity. May we all receive
of this blessing!

253006.「そなたは これで 大魔王となった。\n どうか 魔界を 導いていってくれ。:
With this, you are now the Demon Lord.
Please lead the Demon World duly and justly.

253008.「闇の根源より 出ずる邪霊……魔瘴魂よ！\n 今こそ その姿を 現したまえ！！:
Miasma Souls born from the Great Source of
Darkness! Reveal yourselves now!

253009.「これはどういうことだッ！？ 魔仙卿！！: What is the meaning of this, Oracle!?

253010.「かつて……\n はるか遠き 神話の時代……。:
Once upon a time... in a mythical age far, far
away...

253011.「魔界は アストルティアの一部であった。: The Demon World was once part of Astoltia.

253012.「しかし ある時 大いなる闇の根源……\n ジャゴヌバと呼ばれる存在が 現れ\n:
But one day, the Great Source of Darknessー
the being called Jagonubaーappeared and
infected the land with demon miasma.

253013.「魔瘴の 変異させるチカラは あまりに危険。\n そこで 女神ルティアナは ジャ:
The transforming power of demon miasma was too dangerous. Therefore, the Goddess Lutiana cut off Jagonuba and all the land he defiled from
Astoltia.

253014.「……すなわち この魔界は\n 世界の創造主から 見限られ\n 捨てられた大地な:
...In other words, this Demon World is a land
abandoned and forsaken by the creator of the
world.

253015.「魔界に 残された者達は 死に絶えるか\n 魔物や魔族となって 環境に適応し \:
Those who remained in the Demon World had no choice but to die out or become monsters and demons to adapt to the environment and survive
in this harsh world.

253016.「魔界には 見捨てられた者たちの\n 絶望と無念が 満ちている……。:
The Demon World is filled with the despair and
resignation of the abandoned...

253017.「神話時代の記憶は もはや 失われたが\n 魔界の民の魂には 自分たちを見捨てた:
The memories of that mythic age are no longer with us, but the souls of the people of the Demon World still carry a fiery grudge against
Astoltia, the land that had forsaken them.

253018.「その炎が 大魔王という象徴のもとに結集し\n アストルティアへの 侵略をくり返:
The flames of those grudges rally under the banner of the Demon Lord to invade Astoltia time and again...that is the history
of the Demon World.

253019.「そんな……！\n 魔界が アストルティアから\n 切り捨てられた大地だなんて…:
It can't be...! The Demon World is a land that
was cut off from Astoltia...!?

253020.「新たなる大魔王よ……。\n 果たして そなたに この怨念の連鎖を\n 断ち切る:
To the new Demon Lord, I ask...do you
think you can break the chains of hatred?

253021.「魔仙卿の奴めッ……！\n いったい 何を 考えてやがるんだ！？:
Damn that Oracle...! What the hell are they
thinking!?

253022.「ユシュカ！ わめくのは 後にしろ！\n 魔仙卿の思惑など 知ったことではないが:
Yushka! Save your ranting for later! I don't
really care what the Oracle wants, but right
now, we have to stop that thing!

253023.「クッ……。これは キリが無いな……！: Kgh... There's no end to them...!

253024.「おい 大魔王！！\n 魔瘴魂とやらは 私が なんとかする！\n お前は ユシュ:
Hey, Demon Lord! We'll take care of
these Miasma Souls! You and Yushka take down
the one controlling them!

253025.「お前も 大魔王になった途端 災難だな！\n それじゃあ 行くぜッ！！:
As soon as you become the Demon Lord,
trouble comes knocking! Right then, let's go!

253027.「そして この 殺しても死ななさそうな\n 生命力あふれる カラーリング！\n:
And this coloring is so full of life that even
if you kill it, it won't die! It practically
screams, "Demon Lord"!

253028.「……ふふ。そうだね。\n とっても 大魔王って感じがする。\n きっと 喜んで:
...Hmm hmm. Yes, it does. It certainly has a
Demon Lord feeling to it. I'm sure
they'll be pleased with it!

253030.「ははは……すっかり だまされたな。\n そのカオが 見たかったんだ。:
Hahaha... I totally had you fooled. You should
see the look on your face.

253031.「……おどろかせて 悪かったな。\n ここは 俺が 大魔王になった時のために\n:
...Sorry for spooking you like that. This is
the castle I had secretly built for myself for
when I was to become the Demon Lord.

253032.「ゴダ神殿では いろいろと\n 理屈っぽいことも 言ったが……:
I said a lot of logical-sounding things at
Goda Temple, but...

253033.「俺は この魔界のために\n 奔走してきた お前のことを\n 本当に 大魔王たる:
I truly recognize you as being worthy of being
Demon Lord, for all your hard work for the
Demon World's sake.

253034.「きっと ナジーンがいたら……\n アイツも 同意してくれたはずだ。:
I'm sure that if Najinn were here... he
would say the same thing.

253035.「この城は 大魔王になるお前への 祝いの品だ。\n 受け取ってくれ。:
This castle is a gift for you, the next Demon
Lord. Please accept it.

253036.「礼はいらんぞ。これから 魔界のために\n キリキリ 働いてもらうんだからな！\:
No need for thanks. From now on, you'll work
hard for the sake of the Demon World! You'd
better prepare yourself.

253037.「さて……\n 立派な城も 手に入れたことだし\n これで いつ大魔王になっても:
Well...now that you've got a splendid castle,
you should be fine whenever you finally become
the Demon Lord.

253038.「おいおい！ この オレ様が作った\n ゲージュツ的な 玉座も忘れるでないぞ！！:
Hey! Don't forget the totally artistic
throne I put together!

253039.「ペペロくん あなたの戴冠式に 間に合うように\n 何日も 寝ないで この玉座を:
I heard that Pepero worked on this throne for
days without sleep just so that it would be
ready in time for your coronation.

253040.「な…何を言っている！\n この程度 オレ様にかかれば お手のものだ！\n 貴様:
Wha... what are you talking about!? Something
like this is nothing! I wouldn't put in that
kind of effort just for your sake!

253041.「うふふ……。\n これで あとは 戴冠式を挙げるだけね。\n 楽しみだね！:
Ufufu... now all that's left is the
coronation. I'm looking forward to it!

253042.「……ふむ。準備は ととのったようだな。\n では この大魔王城で\n 戴冠式を:
...Hm. The preparations seem to be in order.
Then let us hold the coronation ceremony here
in the Demon Lord's castle!

253043.「よくぞ 戻った。\n どうやら ふたりの魔王の説得に\n 成功したようだな。:
Welcome back. It seems you've succeeded in
persuading the two Demon Kings.

253044.「それでは いよいよ…………: And now, the time has come...

253046.「今さっき 怪しい奴に イルーシャが\n さらわれちまったんだ！！:
Just now, some shady bastard kidnapped
Illusia!

253047.「クッ……俺が いながら……。\n …………すまない。:
Kgh... and it happened under my watch...
......I'm sorry.

253048.「あまりに一瞬のことで 相手の姿は\n よく わからなかったが……ヤツは\n デ:
It happened so fast that I didn't get a good
look at them... but they were heading towards
the Deathdio Darklands!

253049.「荒原は ジャリムバハ砂漠にある\n ザード遺跡の 東の扉の先にある！:
The wilderness is just beyond the eastern door
of the Zard Ruins in the Jyarimbaha Desert!

253050.「俺は 先に向かうから\n お前も すぐに 来てくれ！\n よろしく 頼んだぞ！:
I'll go on ahead, so make sure you come, too!
I'm counting on you!

253052.「フッ…フフフフ！\n いい戦いだったぞ……！！: Hm... hmhmhmhm! That was a good fight...!

253053.「聞け 皆の者！！\n この者こそ 先の 魔仙卿の選定にて\n 新たな大魔王とし:
Listen up, everyone! This is the one who was
chosen by the Oracle to be the new Demon Lord!

253054.「今の戦いを 見たであろう！\n これでも この者が大魔王になることに\n 異を:
You've seen them fight! Is there anyone here
who would object to this person becoming the
Demon Lord!?

253055.「よし！ これで決まりだ！\n 我がバルディスタは この者を\n 新たな大魔王と:
All right! Then it's settled! We of Valdista
hereby acknowledge this person as the new
Demon Lord!

253057.「……これで お前も\n 少しは やりやすくなっただろう。: ...This should make things easier for you.

253058.「フッ……。戴冠式には 私も 出席しよう。\n くれぐれも ガッカリさせてくれる:
I will also attend the coronation. Please
don't disappoint me, Demon Lord.

253059.「ヴァレリア様と 勝負しようだァ！？\n とんだ 命知らずの\n トンチキ野郎が:
You want to challenge Lady Valeria!? You got
guts, I'll give you that!

253060.「ヴァレリア様ーッ！\n そんな ぽっと出の 若造なんざ\n ぶっ飛ばしてくだせ:
Lady Valeria! Beat that fresh-faced whelp into
a bloody pulp!

253061.「おいおい 全員 ヴァレリア様に賭けるんじゃあ\n 勝負に なんねーじゃんかよ！:
Hey, now! If we all bet on Valeria, it'll
hardly be a competition. Anyone here wanna bet
on the other one?

253063.「……外野が 少々\n やかましいが 気にするな。:
...A little too much noise from the peanut
gallery, but never mind them.

253064.「貴様が 中途半端な奴なら\n ここで潰しておくのが 魔界のため。\n 全力で:
If you lack resolve, then I will end you here
and now for the sake of the Demon World. Don't
you dare hold back.

253066.「試すような真似をして すまなかった……。\n よく 試練を乗り越えられたね。\:
I'm sorry I put you through that trial, but...
you overcame it, nonetheless. I'm impressed.
Congratulations.

253067.「ここは ゼクレス王家の者が\n 大魔王を目指す時 その資質を問うための\n 試:
This is the trial room where those of the
Zechres royal family who aspired to become the
Demon Lord tested themselves.

253068.「そして 試練を乗り越えられた者だけが\n 王冠を手に入れ 大審門へと向かった…:
And only those who could overcome the trials
received the crown and went to the Demongate.
I undertook the same trials myself.

253069.「その王冠を 手にした君は\n まぎれもなく 大魔王にふさわしい。\n 戴冠式に:
With that crown in your hands, you are
unquestionably fit to be the Demon Lord.
I will be sure to attend your coronation.

253070.「……他にも行くべき所が あるんだろう？\n 急いだほうが いいんじゃないかな。:
...You have other places to go, don't you?
Maybe you should hurry.

253071.<pc>は\n大魔王の王冠（だいじなもの）を\n手に入れた！<me 60>:
<pc> received
the Demon Lord's Crown (Key Item)!<me 60>

253072.「さて……\n いいかげん そなたには\n 話しておかねばなるまいな。:
Now then... I suppose it's about time I stop
beating around the bush and tell you.

253073.「……久しぶりだね！ 元気だった？: ...It's been a long time! How have you been?

253074.「おいらにとっては 数百年以上前に\n 時獄の迷宮で 会って以来なんだけど\n:
For me, it's been more than a few hundred
years since we met in the Time Labyrinth, but
for you, sis, I bet it was just recently.

253075.「あの日 世界の滅亡を 阻止するのに\n 協力させてくれって 言ったっけ……。\:
I remember that day when you asked me to help
you prevent the destruction of the world...
Ahh, that really brings back memories...

253076.「おいら 姉ちゃんと 時獄の迷宮で会った後に\n ずっと昔の魔界に 飛ばされちゃ:
After we saw each other in the labyrinth, I
was transported to the Demon World of the
distant past.

253077.「本当なら おいらなんか すぐに\n 魔界の魔物に 殺されるか\n 魔瘴で 死ん:
I thought for sure I would be killed by the
monsters of the Demon World right away, or
died of miasma exposure, but...

253078.「落ちた場所が デモンマウンテンの頂上でさ。\n そこで 先代の魔仙卿に 拾われ:
I ended up at the top of Demon Mountain. The
previous Oracle found me there and saved my
life.

253079.「おいらを拾った時の 先代の魔仙卿は\n ちょうど その役目を 終えようとしてい:
When they found me, the previous Oracle had
just completed their duties, and was looking
for a successor to become the next Oracle.

253080.「あの人は……\n そんな時に 目の前に現れた おいらに\n 後継者の資質を認め:
They saw potential in me, and decided to take
me under their wing.

253081.「魔仙卿となる者は\n 大いなる闇の根源と 契約することによって\n 魔仙卿とし:
Those who become the Oracle gain their power
by forming a contract with the Great Source of
Darkness.

253082.「皮肉にも おいらは\n 闇の根源と 契約したことで\n この魔界でも 生きてい:
Ironically, it's my contract with the Great
Source of Darkness that allows me to survive
in the Demon World.

253083.「そして その契約によって\n 同じ時代に 長い間 留まれないっていう\n 時渡:
And the contract also cured me of the time
travel curse that prevented me from staying in
any one time period for too long...

253084.「闇の根源との契約っていう\n より 強力な呪いを\n 受けただけかもしれないけ:
You could say that a contract with the Great
Source of Darkness is more like an extremely
powerful curse in of itself.

253085.「……でも そのおかげで おいらは\n この魔界の地で 数百年の間 生きてこられ:
...but it's what's kept me alive in the Demon
World for hundreds of years.

253086.「あの 永遠にも思えた 長い放浪の果てに\n たどり着いた この魔界が……\n:
At the end of a long, wandering journey that
felt like an eternity, the Demon World ended
up becoming my resting place.

253087.「……だから おいらにとっては この魔界も\n アストルティアと なんら変わらな:
So for me, the Demon World is no different
from Astoltia, a world to be protected.

253088.「そして 何度も言ったけど 魔界には\n これから かつてない規模の魔瘴の氾濫…:
And as I've said many times before, the Demon World will soon become flooded with miasma on an unprecedented scale... the deadly Age of
Miasma is coming.

253089.「その前に なんとしても 姉ちゃんには\n 大魔王になってもらって\n この魔界:
Before that happens, I want you to become the
next Demon Lord and save the Demon
World.

253090.「さっき 姉ちゃんの気持ちは 聞いたけど\n もう一度 改めて お願いするね。:
I asked you for your thoughts on this earlier,
but I want to hear it from you again, sis.

253091.「そんな！ 一緒に 世界の滅亡を止めようって\n 言ったじゃないか！:
No way! Didn't you say we would stop the
destruction of the world together!?

253092.「だから頼むよ。大魔王になって 数百年\n おいらが守ってきた 魔界と アストル:
That's why I need you. For hundreds of years I've protected this world and Astoltiaーyou have to become the Demon Lord and stop
the Age of Miasma!

253094.「それじゃ 謁見の間に 戻ろう。\n あ……それと 魔仙卿が おいらだってことは:
Well then, let's go back to the audience room.
Oh... and don't tell anyone that I'm the
Oracle.

253095.「人間が 魔仙卿をやってたなんてことが\n バレたら みんな 混乱して\n 不要:
If it were to come out that a human had been
working as the Oracle, it would confuse
everyone and cause an unnecessary uproar.

253105.「よくぞ 戻った。\n ゼクレスとバルディスタでの\n そなたの奮闘ぶりは 聞き:
Welcome back. I have heard of your efforts in
Zechres and Valdista.

253106.「こたびの活躍 まことに大義であった。\n これで あの ふたつの国も\n 無事:
This was a great success and a great cause.
Now the two countries will be able to recover
safely.

253107.「ゼクレスと バルディスタ……\n いや 魔界全土のために\n そなたは よく尽:
You have done so much for Zechres and
Valdista... and all of the Demon World.

253108.「おいおい……。\n 俺の大事な ファラザードのことも\n 忘れないでくれよ。:
Oh come on... don't forget about my precious
Farazard.

253110.「今日は あんたと……こいつに\n 話したいことがあって 来たんだ。:
I came here today to talk to you... and to
them.

253111.「俺は これまで 自分が大魔王となって\n 魔界を変革し 大魔瘴期から救うという:
I've been pursuing my dream of becoming the
Demon Lord, transforming the Demon
World, and saving it from the Age of Miasma...

253112.「だが あの大戦で……\n 同じ夢を 追ってきた\n ナジーンを 失って…………:
But in the war... I lost Najinn...
We had the same dream...

253113.「それから 考え続けてきたんだ……。\n 自分が この先 何をするべきなのかを。:
And I've been thinking... about what I'm going
to do next.

253114.「……そして 俺は やっと気づいたんだ。\n 大魔王の座に 固執しすぎていたこと:
And then I finally realized it. I was too
obsessed with the title of Demon Lord.

253115.「魔界を変革するのに 必ずしも 俺が\n 大魔王になる 必要はない。:
I don't necessarily need to become the Demon
Lord to change the Demon World.

253116.「……お前が ゼクレスと バルディスタで\n やってきたことは 聞いている。今や:
I've heard about your work in Zechres and
Valdista. You have now earned the trust of the
Demon Kings of both countries.

253117.「そんなヤツがいるなら…… そいつが\n 大魔王になって 魔界をまとめ上げるのが:
With someone like that around...the quickest
way to save the Demon World would be for them
to become Demon Lord and unite everyone.

253118.「……お前が 大魔王になれ。: ...I want you to become the Demon Lord.

253119.「私も 賛成よ。\n あなたの 光なら……\n きっと みんなを導ける。:
I'm with you all the way. With your light...
I'm certain you can lead us all.

253120.「ほう……。ここにいる者は皆 そなたが \n 大魔王になることを 望んでおるよう:
Well.. it seems that everyone here wants you
to be the Demon Lord. You...DO want to
become the Demon Lord, don't you? <yesno><close>

253121.「ふむ……。やはり これまで\n 魔と戦い アストルティアを守ってきた\n そな:
Hmm... of course, as one who has fought
against demons and protected Astoltia, the
idea must make you uncomfortable...

253122.「おお……。これまでアストルティアを守ってきた \n そなたには 断られるかと:
Oh... I was prepared for you, who have been protecting Astoltia up to now, to refuse, but surprisingly you seem to be willing to take
the plunge.

253123.「……しかし いずれにしても そなたとは\n ふたりきりで 話さねばならぬことが:
...In any case, there is something I must
discuss with you in private.

253124.「重大な話だ……魔選の儀礼場で話そう。\n ユシュカ。イルーシャ。\n 悪いが:
It is a serious matter... let us speak in the
Ceremonial Hall. Yushka, Illusia... I'm sorry,
but I must ask you to wait here.

253126.「我は 以前 魔界の各国が歩む 復興の道は\n 険しいものになるだろうと 話した:
I once told you that the road to recovery for
the nations of the Demon World would be a
difficult one.

253127.「……まさしく 今 ゼクレスとバルディスタ\n 双方の国にて 解決しがたき問題が:
...It seems that there is now an insoluble
problem in the lands of both Zechres and
Valdista.

253128.「そこで そなたには 両国へおもむき\n それぞれの問題を 解決する\n 手助け:
So I would like you to go to both countries
and help resolve these problems.

253129.「……私も 一緒に行くわ。\n 魔瘴をあやつる 私のチカラが\n 何かの役に 立:
...I'll go with you. My ability to manipulate
demon miasma might be of some use to you.

253130.「我は 危険だと 言っておるのだが\n どうしても そなたと 一緒に行くと\n:
I have told you that it is dangerous, but you
won't listen to me anyway.

253131.「……ごめんなさい。\n でも どうしても 行きたいの。: ...I'm sorry. But I really want to go.

253132.「……わかっておる。\n 見かけによらず 意志の強い娘だ。:
...I understand. You are a strong-willed girl,
despite your appearance.

253133.「……では そなたは さっそく\n ゼクレスと バルディスタに 向かってくれ。\:
Then I want you to head straight for Zechres
and Valdista. You may choose either one to
visit first.

253134.「両国で起こっている問題が 解決したら\n 我のもとに 戻ってくるがよい。\n:
Return to me when the problems in both
countries are resolved. I ask for your
cooperation in this endeavor.

253436.「強くなった 私を……\n どうか 見守っていて。: Please watch over me as I grow stronger...

253437.こうして <pc>の城で\n大魔王戴冠式が 執りおこなわれることになり\nそのし:
Thus, the coronation ceremony of the Demon World is to be held at the castle of , and the news quickly spread
throughout the Demon World...

253438.そして 大魔王戴冠式の日が やってきた！<me 64>:
And then, the Demon Lord's coronation day
had arrived!<me 64>

253453.「うおおおおおおおーッ！！！！\n 新しい 大魔王様の 誕生だァーッ！！！！:
Raaaaaaahhhh!!!! The birth of a new Demon
Lord!!!

253690.「……この者は この魔界の地で\n 大魔王となり 来たるべき 大魔瘴期から\n:
...This person has agreed to become the Demon
Lord, and to devote themselves to saving the
Demon World from the coming Age of Miasma.

253693.「ついては 新たな大魔王の誕生を祝い\n 魔界全土に 知らしめるため\n 戴冠式:
I would like to hold a coronation ceremony to
celebrate the birth of the new Demon Lord
and let all of the Demon World know.

253694.「この戴冠式には ユシュカはもちろんのこと\n ゼクレスの魔王アスバル バルディ:
For this coronation, not only Yushka, but also
Demon King Asbal of Zechres and Demon King
Valeria of Valdista must come.

253695.「そこで そなたには ふたりに\n 戴冠式に出席するよう 話をつけてきてほしい。:
So, I would like you to go talk to them and
ask them to attend the coronation.

253696.「我が書いた親書を 見せれば\n 話が 早かろう。持っていくがよい。:
It would be quicker if I just show you the
letters I prepared. Take them with you.

253697.<pc>は \nヴァレリアへの親書（だいじなもの）と\nアスバルへの親書（だいじ:
<pc> received
the Official Letter to Valeria (Key Item) and
the Official Letter to Asbal (Key Item)!<me 60>

253698.「バルディスタは まだ 慌ただしかろう。\n まずは ゼクレスにいる アスバルの:
Valdista is likely still recovering. First, go
to Asbal in Zechres, then to Valeria.

254018.「……久しぶりだな！ 元気だったか。: ...It's been a long time! How have you been?

254019.「……久しぶりね！ 元気だった？: ...It's been a long time! How have you been?

254020.「……久しぶりだね！ 元気だった？: ...It's been a long time! How have you been?

254021.「オレにとっては 数百年以上前に\n 時獄の迷宮で 会って以来なんだが\n お前:
For me, it's been more than a few hundred
years since we met in the Time Labyrinth, but
for you, I bet it was just recently.

254022.「あたしにとっては 数百年以上前に\n 時獄の迷宮で 会って以来なんだけど\n:
For me, it's been more than a few hundred
years since we met in the Time Labyrinth, but
for you, I bet it was just recently.

254023.「私にとっては 数百年以上前に\n 時獄の迷宮で 会って以来なんだけど\n お姉:
For me, it's been more than a few hundred
years since we met in the Time Labyrinth, but
for you, sis, I bet it was just recently.

254024.「あの日 世界の滅亡を 阻止するのに\n 協力させてくれって 言っただろう……。:
I remember that day when you asked me to help
you prevent the destruction of the world...
Ahh, that really brings back memories...

254025.「あの日 世界の滅亡を 阻止するのに\n 協力するって 言ったでしょう……。\n:

you prevent the destruction of the world...

254026.「あの日 世界の滅亡を阻止するのに\n 協力させてって 言ったでしょ……。\n:

you prevent the destruction of the world...

254027.「オレ お前と 時獄の迷宮で会った後に\n ずっと昔の魔界に 飛ばされちまったん:

past.

254028.「あたし あんたと 時獄の迷宮で会った後に\n ずっと昔の魔界に 飛ばされちゃっ:

254029.「私 お姉ちゃんと 時獄の迷宮で会った後に\n ずっと昔の魔界に 飛ばされちゃっ:

transported to the Demon World of the distant
past.

254030.「本当なら オレなんか すぐに\n 魔界の魔物に 殺されるか\n 魔瘴で 死んじ:
I thought for sure I would be killed by the
monsters of the Demon World right away, or
died of miasma exposure, but...

254031.「本当なら あたしなんか すぐに\n 魔界の魔物に 殺されるか\n 魔瘴で 死ん:

monsters of the Demon World right away, or

previous Oracle found me there and saved my

254034.「落ちた場所が デモンマウンテンの頂上でね。\n そこで 先代の魔仙卿に 拾われ:

254042.「魔仙卿となる者は\n 大いなる闇の根源と 契約することによって\n 魔仙卿とし:

254049.「そして その契約によって\n 同じ時代に 長い間 留まれないっていう\n 時渡:

254051.「闇の根源との契約っていう\n より 強力な呪いを\n 受けただけかもしれないけ:

254054.「……でも そのおかげで オレは\n この魔界の地で 数百年の間 生きてこられた:

254056.「……でも そのおかげで 私は\n この魔界の地で 数百年の間 生きてこられた。:

254057.「あの 永遠にも思えた 長い放浪の果てに\n たどり着いた この魔界が……\n:
